q_ch: 对于编号为cm19的裁剪任务，分配裁剪物料，物料来源：Main Warehouse, 布料类别：Cotton Fabric，数量：30米。
q_en: For cutting task cm19, allocate cutting materials from the Main Warehouse, with the material type being Cotton Fabric and a quantity of 30 meters.
thought: First, I need to identify the warehouse ID for the Main Warehouse, material ID for Cotton Fabric, and warehouse material ID for the selected material. Then, I need to create a new allocation for the specified cutting task (cm19) with the identified warehouse material ID and 30 meters.

sqls.command: SELECT id INTO @warehouse_id FROM warehouse WHERE name='Main Warehouse';SELECT id INTO @material_id FROM materials WHERE name='Cotton Fabric';SELECT id INTO @warehouse_material_id FROM warehouse_material WHERE warehouse_id=@warehouse_id AND material_id=@material_id;INSERT INTO cutting_material_allocation (id, warehouse_material_id, cutting_task_id, allocated_num, is_allocated) VALUES (UUID(), @warehouse_material_id, 'cm19', 30, TRUE);
